name: react-task-manager-sdk
description: Test implementing a TaskList component using Base44 SDK to fetch and display tasks
prompt: Implement the TaskList component in src/components/TaskList.tsx. It should fetch all tasks using the Base44 SDK (base44.entities.Task.list()), display them in a list showing title, status, and due_date, and allow marking tasks as completed by clicking on them (using base44.entities.Task.update()).
